group_1.narration: I don't want to waste my summer vacation...@I want to make lots of memories with Masara!@Then it occurred to me that we should go to the beach!
We've been mountain climbing a lot,@but we've never been to the ocean before.
I don't have any proper summer swimwear,@so I asked her to come with me to pick one out.

group_1.textCenter: Hmm... This one is cute,@but this one is good too...
Which of these do you prefer?

group_1.textRight: As long as it works as a swimsuit,@I don’t mind.
I don’t think it’ll change anything@either way.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... That may be the case if you@look at it functionally, but...
How about the design?@Which one looks better?

group_1.textRight: As long as you like it,
I don’t care which one you choose.

group_1.textLeft: Oh...um, yeah!
In that case...@[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]I think I’ll try the yellow one.
Hm?

group_1.textRight: That bathing suit has a lot of straps on it...@Do you have to wrap them around your body?

group_1.textLeft: ...Pfft, hahaha…!
N-No!@I’m sorry for laughing all of a sudden.
These straps are kind of fashionable right now...@They’re meant to be decorative.
Well, they probably don't have any@practical purpose.
I think it’s more that they help give you@a different vibe than you normally have?
Ah! Masara, if you want to,@could you help me put it on?

group_1.textRight: ...Alright,@but is it really okay if I do that?

group_1.textLeft: It’s definitely okay!
What do you think?
Is that because it’s the swimsuit@I chose?

group_1.textRight: That’s one part of it, but...
There’s a different atmosphere to you than usual.@I think I understand that now.

group_1.textLeft: Um... Thank you.
(...You know, you just say these kinds@of things so easily…)
All right,@then I’ll get this one!
So...what about you?
You said you already have a swimsuit,@but...it’s just a plain one, right?
Can I pick out one that suits you better?

group_1.narration: I tried picking out several swimsuits that@would suit Masara and showed them off to her, but..

group_1.textLeft: ...Are you sure you want to go to the@beach in your regular swimsuit?

group_1.textRight: Is there any reason why that won’t work?

group_1.textLeft: It’s not that you can’t, Masara, it’s just...@I hope you’re happy with it...
Hmm...
...Okay, I’ll give up on the swimsuit.
But we need to buy matching towels@instead!
Yes! Beach towels!
The beach can get crowded,@so if we get separated,
I think it’d be easier to find each@other if we had matching towels.
I’m sure you have plenty of towels, but...
[chara:301601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What?! Are you sure?
(Yes, thank goodness…)
Well, let’s go pick one out,@shall we?
